tweaked_creative_menu.config.title: Mod Config
tweaked_creative_menu.config.tabSounds.d: Toggles whether or not when clicking on tabs it produces a click sound.
tweaked_creative_menu.config.tabPopout.d: Toggles whether or not tabs should pop out when hovering, along with the icon being popped out when selected.
tweaked_creative_menu.config.tooltipMode: This option dictates how tooltips should be positioned when hovering tabs
